loratadine.name: Loratadine
loratadine.precautions: Avoid alcohol. Suitable for daily use.

metformin.name: Metformin
metformin.usage: Helps control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.
metformin.precautions: Take with food. Monitor kidney function.

omeprazole.name: Omeprazole
omeprazole.usage: Reduces stomach acid, treats GERD and ulcers.
omeprazole.precautions: Not for long-term use unless prescribed.

salbutamol.name: Salbutamol
salbutamol.precautions: Use with a spacer if prescribed. Monitor heart rate.

azithromycin.name: Azithromycin
azithromycin.usage: Antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
azithromycin.precautions: Take the full dose. Take with food if stomach upset.

aspirin.name: Aspirin
aspirin.usage: Relieves pain, inflammation, and prevents blood clots.
aspirin.precautions: Avoid if you have ulcers or bleeding disorders.

diphenhydramine.name: Diphenhydramine
diphenhydramine.usage: Used to relieve allergy symptoms and as a sleep aid.
diphenhydramine.precautions: Avoid alcohol. Not for long-term use.

clotrimazole.name: Clotrimazole
clotrimazole.usage: Treats fungal infections like athleteâ€™s foot and yeast infections.
clotrimazole.precautions: Apply only to affected area. Avoid eyes and mouth.

hydrocortisone.name: Hydrocortisone
hydrocortisone.usage: Relieves skin inflammation, itching, and rashes.
hydrocortisone.precautions: Use a thin layer. Avoid prolonged use.

ranitidine.name: Ranitidine
ranitidine.usage: Treats and prevents ulcers and acid reflux.

doxycycline.name: Doxycycline
doxycycline.usage: Broad-spectrum antibiotic for infections like acne or respiratory tract infections.
doxycycline.precautions: Avoid sunlight. Take with plenty of water.

famotidine.name: Famotidine
famotidine.usage: Treats acid reflux and stomach ulcers.
famotidine.precautions: Use for short-term relief unless prescribed.

mefenamic_acid.name: Mefenamic Acid
mefenamic_acid.usage: Used to relieve pain from menstrual cramps, headaches, and inflammation.
mefenamic_acid.precautions: Take with meals. Avoid in those with kidney issues.
